name: Laretta Allen
description: Laretta Allen is the older sister to Mary Allen...

name: Pehr Noren
description: Pehr Noren, the father of Karin Falkman (nee Noren), who is the mother of Herman Falkman, who is the father of Allen B Falkman, my Dad.

name: Anna Palmer
description: Anne Palmer is the mother of Margaret Allen (nee Carroll). Who in turn is the mother of Mary Falkman (nee Allen). In turn Mary Falkman is the mother of Allen Falkman Sr., my Dad

name: Margaret Carroll
description: Margaret Carroll, the wife to Gerald Allen. And mother of Mary Allen. Who in turn is the mother of Allen Falkman Sr., my Dad.

name: Christina Noren
description: Christina Noren (nee Andersdotter), is the step-mother of Karin Noren. Mother of Herman Falkman. Who in turn is the father of Allen Falkman Sr., my Dad

name: Nils Pit Falkman
description: Nils Pit Falkman. Is the father of Herman Falkman. Who in turn is the father of Allen Falkman Sr., my Dad.

name: Karen Falkman
description: Karen Falkman (nee Noren) is the wife of Peter Falkman. Who's son, Herman is the father of Allen Falkman Sr., my Dad.

name: John Lufgren
description: John Lufgren is the older brother of Nils Pit Falkman. Who is my great-grandfather.

name: Willamina Kendt
description: Willamina Kindt is one of the niece's of Mary Allen. Mary Allen in turn is the mother of Allen Fallkman Sr., my dad.

name: Ellen Allen
description: Ellen Allen is the wife of Dennis Allen, and Dennis is the father of Gerald Allen. Now Gerald Allen is Mary Falkman's (nee Allen) father. And Mary is Allen Falkman Sr. mother.

name: William Allen
description: William Allen is the brother to Mary Falkman (nee Allen). And she in-turn is the mother of Allen Falkman Sr., my father.

name: Martha Noren
description: Martha Noren is Karen Falkman (nee Noren) half sister.

name: Anna Noren
description: Anna Noren is the sister of Karen Falkman (nee Noren), who is the wife of Peter Falkman. Who's son, Herman is the father of Allen Falkman Sr., my Dad.

name: Theodore Falkman
description: Theodore Falkman is one of the brothers of Herman Falkman. Who's son, Allen is, my Dad.

name: James Carroll
description: James Carroll is an uncle of Mary Falkman (nee Allen). Who in turn is the mother of Allen Falkman, my father.

name: Jerry Falkman
description:
Jerry was born in San Mateo California at the ripe age of 0.

He moved to Illinois where he attended kindergarten at Long school on Forster Avenue followed by grades 1 and 2 at St. Cornilius. They moved to the Kedzie Avenue area where he attended grades 3 and 4 at St. Veronica.

When Jerry was 10 his parents moved to Maywood where he attanded Roosevelt Elementary School and Provise East High School.

He new at an early age that he wanted to persue a career in electrical engineering.
